course_title: Special Topics in Language and Culture: Hispanic Science Fiction
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 16 / Seats Avail: 5Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Timed, asynchronous assessments. Technology required: webcam, microphone.
course_description: Study of Hispanic authors, genres, literary periods, cinema, or cultural trends not represented in the regular curriculum. The structure of the particular course is determined by the nature of the topic and the preference of the instructor.
